name: Holo Sudoku
description:
Inspired by Ollie's tweet, here's a picture sudoku that features not just Hololive but also Holostars, companions, fandoms, and staff heads. And it's not just heads but cute and adorable gyate heads! Enjoy more than a hundred variations of gyate holochars while you play!
